Instance Method# scan(_:_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func scan<T>(
    _ initialResult: T,
    _ nextPartialResult: @escaping (T, Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output) -> T
) -> Publishers.Sequence<[T], Failure>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/scan(_:_:)#see-also)
